name: an-e-motion
tag_list: explanatory-video, explainer-videos, animation-video, product-movies, product-videos, internet-advertising, online-video, infographics-animation, e-learning, animated-product-explanatory-video-makers
overview:
an-e-motion is an animated explanatory video maker. an-e-motion makes emotionally engaging videos, product movies and animated demos. India’s only animation studio making product movies and explanatory videos.

Be it any product or services, after hearing your story, it gets penned down to a script, giving it a shape in sketches, bringing it to life through animation, some music, voice over etc, etc. and then show casing it to the world with the same heightened emotion with which you feel your world, your product.

an-e-motion produces custom explanatory videos for brands, businesses and organizations looking to share their ideas with the world. They make these online videos to educate and enlightening a brand’s target audience through the use of emerging online media.

Simple, engaging, informative and entertaining: is what we believe while we create new ways of explaining concepts.
